0.1.name: wordpress/simple-slideshow-builder
0.1.description:
A simple slideshow builder that uses a short code to easily place onto your website! :D

*After installing make sure you change the slideshow settings for it to display properly! :)

*currently supports up to 10 images with descriptions! :)

*Features
** Customizable width
** Background color
** Content for images!
** and more! :D
